secret_rule: Only items that are used in a typical school classroom can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "pencil" and "notebook".
I'll make a new guess. Can I bring a "textbook" to the game?
Yes, you can bring a textbook.
I'll make a new guess. Can I bring a "journal" to the game?
Yes, you can bring a journal.

Based on the examples provided ("pencil," "notebook," "textbook," and "journal"), the rule seems to involve items typically associated with writing or note-taking. A reasonable guess for the rule is: "The items you can bring to the game are related to writing or note-taking."
